title: How do I get third-party applications？
answer:
Log in to Android Market to download third party applications. For example, if you want to download and install a file manager, do the following:  
1、Register for a Google account.  
2、Access Android Market.  
3、Touch the search bar to search for File Manager.  
4、After the application is found, touch Install to install it.
